Class PanelPrincipal

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • Vue.PanelPrincipal
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.Observer, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class PanelPrincipal
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.util.Observer
    Panel principal de la fenetre principale du jeu, il gère le positionnement des panels internes
    Author:
    Youssef,Ananias
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
